Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Amends the public library construction grant program in relation to the effectivness thereof
Summary: Makes permanent certain provisions relating to the public library construction grant program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 498 of the laws of 2011 amending the education law relating to the public library construction grant program, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
